page.title: 10ANNUAL CIVIC SHOW,SEAHAM
page.content: EVERY SEPTEMBER THE CIVIC SHOW IS A GRANDE EVENT IN SEAHAM.THE DISPLAYS AND EVENTS ARE VARIED.THERE IS OFTEN A DISPLAY FROM THE POLICE MOTOR CYCLING TEAM AND FROM THE POLICE DOG TEAM.IN 1984 WE HAD A FLYOVER FROM A VULCAN BOMBER AND TWO SPITFIRES.A PARACHUTE TEAM LANDED ON THE CIVIC SHOW FIELD. THERE ARE HORTICULTURAL COMMPETITIONS AND MANY SIDESHOWS AND FAIRGROUND ATTRACTIONS.LOCAL FOOTBALL TEAMS COMPETE IN A 6 A SIDE COMPETITION.THE ARMY,THE R.A.F. AND THE ROYAL NAVY OFTEN HAVE STALLS AT THE SHOW.LAST YEAR AN ESCAPOLOGIST DID HIS ACT HANGING FROM A CRANE.ADMISSION IS USUALLY Â£1.00 AND ALL EVENTS ARE FREE APART FROM THE FAIRGROUND STALLS.THE SHOW IS ALWAYS ON FOR TWO DAYS,A SATURDAY AND SUNDAY IN SEPTEMBER.LAST YEAR APPROX. 8,000 PEOPLE ATTENDED.
